item.description:
In honor of Saint Patrick's Day there will be a special treat for any pet that is wearing a bit o'the green! We can watch the pups dance a jig, go on a leprechaun hunt, or search for 4 leaf clovers.
Make sure to bring updated vaccines for Rabies, DHLLP, & Bordatella.
item.why: We've almost made it past snowy winter days, shoveling...ice on the windshield! I'm looking forward to sunshiny mornings, green grass and... rainy days! Let's celebrate the 1st day of Spring together!
item.name: 1st Day of Spring Celebration!
